Sentencas: The slow oxygen reduction reaction kinetics as well as structural and chemical instability of cathode are the main barriers hindering the development of the solid oxide fuel cell operated at intermediate temperature.
Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, immense efforts have been devoted to address these two demanding issues.
Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Perovskite cathodes based on SrCoO3-delta show promising electroactivity on oxygen reduction at intermediate temperature but are susceptible to contaminates in air.
Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this short review, we mainly cover the recent advances in SrCoO3-delta-based perovskite cathode development, with emphasis on doping strategies in electroactivity enhancement and cathode tolerance to CO2.
Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Some future research directions are also recommended at the end of this review.
Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: Recent development on perovskite-type cathode materials based on SrCoO3-δ parent oxide for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
